item.title: Joe Brooks - Six String Soldier
item.description:
KY: 79241

This is a story of a
six string soldier
Down in the trenches
six years bolder
Sleeve bloody from the
heart his worn
Never valley
gives a mountain
Such a sweet
her taste
In my mouth is
so much louder
Than my
thoughts
And I won’t take
my foot from the door
Stand up with your
weapons of war
It’s the man
that’s going down
Oh oh
you and me could go
So oh
famously you know
Like
Lennon and Ono
Except
without the loco oh
La la
who cares what you are
Oh oh
I’m no superstar
But with this weapon
on my shoudler
I’d be your
six string soldier
La la la la la hey
la la la la la hey
This is a glory of a
boyhood pipe dream
To wear a crown and
make the girls scream
Tired hungry pour some
more of that sweet tea
The days of taking
easy for the honey
Come back
with the stay
So watch out cos the
man is singing now
Woah oh
you and me could go
So oh
famously you know
Like
Lennon and Ono
Except
without the loco oh
La la
who cares what you are
Oh oh
I’m no superstar
But with this weapon
on my shoudler
I’ll be your
six string soldier
La la la la la hey
la la la la la
When your heart is
breaking down
You know
I’ll be backing down
And when it’s love
it will restore
Much finer than
before
This thing is
huge
It’s just the
beginning
It’s
something new
It’s the
start of me and
Oh oh
you and me could go
So oh
famously you know
Like
Lennon and Ono

without the loco

who cares what you are

on my shoudler
